name: SINGULARITY WORLD
description:
What exactly is our consciousness? Where does it come from?

Overview of the Game


A boy seeking consciousness searches the ruined tower for answers.
Which answer will the boy know on the top floor of the tower?


The player (That’s you) represents your own consciousness.
However, the player does not have specific goals to fulfill.
The essence of this game is to be cognizant of your choices, as your decisions affect the ending you will reach.
There are 5 endings you can reach in this game.


WASD or arrow keys: move around
Enter or space key: shoot
P: pause
I: check ammo

Don't shoot bullets in vain

Your ending will change depending on how you beat the game.
You might see the ending that only you were able to reach.
